enabled.description: Sets whether the stream caching is enabled. <p/> <b>Notice: This cannot be changed at runtime.

spoolDirectory.description: Sets the spool (temporary) directory to use for overflow and spooling to disk. <p/> If no spool directory has been explicit configured, then a temporary directory is created in the <tt>java.io.tmpdir directory.

spoolCipher.description: Sets a cipher name to use when spooling to disk to write with encryption. <p/> By default the data is not encrypted.

spoolThreshold.description: Threshold in bytes when overflow to disk is activated. <p/> The default threshold is org.apache.camel.StreamCache#DEFAULT_SPOOL_THRESHOLD bytes (eg 128kb). Use <tt>-1 to disable overflow to disk.

spoolUsedHeapMemoryThreshold.description: Sets a percentage (1-99) of used heap memory threshold to activate spooling to disk.

spoolUsedHeapMemoryLimit.description: Sets what the upper bounds should be when spoolUsedHeapMemoryThreshold is in use.

spoolRules.description: Reference to one or more custom org.apache.camel.spi.StreamCachingStrategy.SpoolRule to use. Multiple rules can be separated by comma.

bufferSize.description: Sets the buffer size to use when allocating in-memory buffers used for in-memory stream caches. <p/> The default size is org.apache.camel.util.IOHelper#DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE

removeSpoolDirectoryWhenStopping.description: Whether to remove the temporary directory when stopping. <p/> This option is default <tt>true

anySpoolRules.description: Sets whether if just any of the org.apache.camel.spi.StreamCachingStrategy.SpoolRule rules returns <tt>true then shouldSpoolCache(long) returns <tt>true. If this option is <tt>false, then <b>all the org.apache.camel.spi.StreamCachingStrategy.SpoolRule must return <tt>true. <p/> The default value is <tt>false which means that all the rules must return <tt>true.
